change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by Lowell Bowditch
Replaced LYRIC Meter= tag with SPEECH Meter=

$Log: aristoph.birds_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.4 2013-06-13 12:41:19 gcrane tagging now should be compatible with CTS

Revision 1.2 2011-01-13 03:38:23 gcrane more refinements making these files SDL compatible
Revision 1.1 2010-12-25 20:14:23 gcrane base file -- main difference is that this uses LB milestones rather than L tags
Revision 1.3 2010/06/21 16:42:23 gcrane small fixes to Greek errors -- mainly accent issues with the speaker names
Revision 1.2 2009/10/30 19:54:18 lcerrato fixed typo on 676 confirmed with source
Revision 1.1 2009/10/08 19:12:08 rsingh04 began reorganizing texts module by collection. created separate work directory in texts module to keep hopper files separate from in progress files

Revision 1.3 2008/12/18 20:23:20 lcerrato fixing typos

Revision 1.10 2003/10/10 21:00:53 lcerrato removed errant tros on line 837 confirmed by source
Revision 1.9 2003/07/01 22:14:34 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.8 2000/03/06 20:10:31 amahoney remove spurious headers, which mess up short toc
Revision 1.7 2000/03/04 20:33:53 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.6 2000/02/04 20:06:40 amahoney fix author -- not Sophocles!

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: oi)/moi ta/las, o( *zeu\s o(/pws mh/ m' o)/yetai.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: a)po\ ga/r m' o)lei=s, ei)/ m' e)nqa/d' o( *zeu\s o)/yetai.

touti\ labw/n mou to\ skia/deion u(pe/rexe
a)/nwqen, w(s a)\n mh/ m' o(rw=sin oi( qeoi/.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.l: eu)= g' e)peno/hsas au)to\ kai\ promhqikw=s.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: ma/lista pa/ntwn. e(\n de/ soi le/gw safe/s:

u(mei=s de\ mh\ spe/ndesq', e)a\n mh\ paradidw=|
to\ skh=ptron o( *zeu\s toi=sin o)/rnisin pa/lin,

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: th\n eu)nomi/an th\n swfrosu/nhn ta\ new/ria,
th\n loidori/an to\n kwlakre/thn ta\ triw/bola.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: h(/n g' h)\n su\ par' e)kei/nou parala/bh|s, pa/nt' e)/xeis.
tou/twn e(/neka deu=r' h)=lqon, i(/na fra/saimi/ soi.
a)ei/ pot' a)nqrw/pois ga\r eu)/nous ei)/m' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.l: mo/non qew=n ga\r dia\ s' a)panqraki/zomen.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: misw= d' a(/pantas tou\s qeou/s, w(s oi)=sqa su/.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.l: nh\ to\n *di/' a)ei\ dh=ta qeomish\s e)/fus.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.l: *ti/mwn kaqaro/s. a)ll' w(s a)\n a)potre/xw pa/lin,

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.l: kai\ to\n di/fron ge difrofo/rei tondi\ labw/n.

sp.speaker: *poseidw=n
sp.l: ou(=tos ti/ dra=|s; e)p' a)riste/r' ou(/tws a)mpe/xei;

sp.speaker: *poseidw=n
sp.l: oi)/mwze: polu\ ga\r dh/ s' e)gw\

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.l: th\n turo/knhsti/n tis do/tw: fe/re si/lfion:
turo\n fere/tw tis: purpo/lei tou\s a)/nqrakas.

sp.speaker: *poseidw=n
sp.l: to\n a)/ndra xai/rein oi( qeoi\ keleu/omen

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: ta\ de\ kre/a tou= tau=t' e)sti/n;

sp.speaker: *poseidw=n
sp.l: para\ tw=n qew=n peri\ pole/mou katallagh=s.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.l: e)/laion ou)k e)/nestin e)n th=| lhku/qw|.

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: kai\ mh\n ta/ g' o)rni/qeia lipa/r' ei)=nai pre/pei.

sp.speaker: *poseidw=n
sp.l: h(mei=s te ga\r polemou=ntes ou) kerdai/nomen,
u(mei=s t' a)\n h(mi=n toi=s qeoi=s o)/ntes fi/loi
o)/mbrion u(/dwr a)\n ei)/xet' e)n toi=s te/lmasin,
a)lkuoni/das t' a)\n h)/geq' h(me/ras a)ei/.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.l: a)ll' ou)/te pro/teron pw/poq' h(mei=s h)/rcamen

sponda\s poiei=sqai. ta\ de\ di/kai' e)sti\n tadi/,
to\ skh=ptron h(mi=n toi=sin o)/rnisin pa/lin

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
sp.l: e)moi\ me\n a)po/xrh tau=ta kai\ yhfi/zomai.

sp.speaker: *poseidw=n

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos

e)a\n de\ tou\s o)/rnis e)/xhte summa/xous,
o(/tan o)mnu/h| tis to\n ko/raka kai\ to\n *di/a,

sp.speaker: *poseidw=n

th\n de\ *basi/leian th\n ko/rhn gunai=k' e)moi\

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos

sp.speaker: *poseidw=n
sp.l: ti/ d' w)|zu/r'; ou)k oi)=sq' e)capatw/menos pa/lai;

pe/nhs e)/sei su/. sou= ga\r a(/panta gi/gnetai

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos

tw=n ga\r patrw/|wn ou)d' a)karh= me/testi/ soi

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.l: w)/n ge ce/nhs gunaiko/s. h)\ pw=s a)/n pote

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.l: ou(=tos o( *poseidw=n prw=tos, o(\s e)pai/rei se nu=n,

‘no/qw| de\ mh\ ei)=nai a)gxistei/an pai/dwn o)/ntwn

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s

a)ll' h)\n meq' h(mw=n h)=|s, katasth/sas s' e)gw\

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s

sp.l: e)n tw=| *triballw=| pa=n to\ pra=gma. ti/ su\ le/geis;

sp.speaker: *(hraklh=s
